nodes.text: A main city was located on the Mid Rim planet Toledian. Around 34 ABY, the city was destroyed in a mining accident. The news of the destruction of the city reached the planet Batuu, where it was discussed by residents of Black Spire Outpost. Julen Rakab, a Batuuan resident, overheard that chaos rose on Toledian after the accident while he was with the smuggler Izal Garsea at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo.
The city was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
